content:
Apologies for the earlier error. Here's the revised code with proper linkages:
```css
graph TD
TV[End Goal: Improved Experience] 
TV --> AR[Augmented Reality Experience]
AR --> ENJOY[Terminal Value: Enjoyment]
AR --> IMMERSION[Terminal Value: Immersion]
IMMERSION --> ENGAGEMENT[Instrumental Value: High Engagement]
ENJOY --> VISUAL_APPEAL[Instrumental Value: Visual Appeal]
ENJOY --> USABILITY[Instrumental Value: Usability]
VISUAL_APPEAL --> GRAPHICS[Attribute: High-Quality Graphics]
VISUAL_APPEAL --> ANIMATION[Attribute: Smooth Animation]
USABILITY --> EASY_TO_USE[Attribute: Easy to Use]
USABILITY --> INTERACTION[Attribute: Interaction]
EASY_TO_USE --> ACCESSIBILITY[Attribute: Accessibility]
EASY_TO_USE --> USER_FRIENDLINESS[Attribute: User-Friendliness]
INTERACTION --> CUSTOMIZATION[Attribute: Customization]
INTERACTION --> FEEDBACK[Attribute: Real-time Feedback]

subgraph Negative Implications
PRIVACY[Attribute: Privacy Concerns]
COST[Attribute: Increased Cost]
ADOPTION[Attribute: Low Adoption]
end

PRIVACY -.-> AR
COST -.-> AR
ADOPTION -.-> AR
```
The linkages should now be visible in the diagram.
